Certified Unified Program Agency
Certified Unified Program Agency
page.normal_text:
Implemented in 1996.
Implemented in 1996.

Intent: Reduce the burden on business by eliminating multiple inspections and fees.
Intent: Reduce the burden on business by
eliminating multiple inspections and fees.

Consolidate six separate programs into single inspection, permit and fee.
Consolidate six separate programs into single
inspection, permit and fee.

Applies to incorporated and unincorporated areas.
Applies to incorporated and unincorporated
areas.

page.title:
Underground Storage Tanks (UST)
Underground Storage Tanks (UST)
page.normal_text:
Purpose is to protect groundwater from contamination through prevention using secondary containment and continuous monitoring systems / equipment.

from contamination through
prevention using secondary
containment and continuous
monitoring systems / equipment.
